legal_basis: Section 9 of the Crown Liability and Proceedings Act
decision_outcome: motion to strike denied except for minor amendments
procedural_fairness: Rule 221(1)(a) of the Federal Court Rules

legal_basis: Section 9 of the Crown Liability and Proceedings Act
procedure_followed: Defendant moved to strike the claim arguing statutory bars
Court analyzed fiduciary duty and scope of statutory provisions
decision_reasoning: not plain and obvious that these injuries are covered by his pension or barred by statute
result_of_case: Claim allowed to proceed except for specific language on wrongful termination
conclusion_outcome: motion to strike is denied except for the term 'wrongfully' in relation to termination
